sen.j: 京都会館（きょうとかいかん）は、京都府京都市左京区岡崎最勝寺町にあるコンサートホールである。
sen.e: Located in Saishoji-cho, Okazaki, Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, Kyoto Kaikan Hall is for concerts.
Located in Saishoji-cho, Okazaki, Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, Kyoto Kaikan Hall is for concerts.
Kyoto Kaikan Hall is for concerts, located in Okazaki Saishoji-cho, Sakyo-ku Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 設計は前川國男で1960年（昭和35年）に開館。
sen.e: Designed by Kunio MAEKAWA, it opened in 1960.
Designed by Kunio MAEKAWA, it opened in 1960.
Designed by Kunio MAEKAWA, it opened in 1960.

sen.j: 「第一ホール」は京都府内で唯一2,000席の座席を越えるホールである。
sen.e: Of the halls in Kyoto Prefecture, "The first hall in this building" alone is provided with more than 2,000 seats.
Of the halls in Kyoto Prefecture, "The first hall in this building" alone is provided with more than 2,000 seats.
The first hall' in this building is alone provided with more than 2,000 seats among the halls in Kyoto Prefecture.
